features: This countertop stand make up mirror is double sided with 1X/3X magnification.One side is 3x Magnification Mirror, and the other side is High Definition Normal Mirror ,It can zoom in your facial detail and bring you a clear vision of your makeup look. which creates different choice for you.
With 360°free rotation design, this 3X magnifying makeup mirror is easy for you to swivel and adjust the angle. You can easily select the best angle and position to make up.

The Base of this cosmetic mirror is made of 100% natural bamboo bracket with matte plastic frame, waterproof, environmentally friendly and superb paint process, the bamboo base and white trim with simple style, adding stylish and modern decoration to any room. Size:1.7" x 7" x 8",large mirror surface.

Compared with those large desktop Vanity mirrors, this make up mirror is smaller,more convenient to move, and more portable.So this beauty mirror can be placed on every desktop,takes up small space on vanities, bathroom countertops, dressing tables, makeup tables or bedroom dressers. simple and lightweight design,can be used as a handheld mirror for morning makeup or a shaving mirror, etc.

PERFECT GIFT FOR ALL BEAUTY JUNKIES – A gift that every beauty lover will adore! Perfect for bridesmaids, girlfriends, college students, makeup artists, hair stylists, sisters, daughters, mothers, teenagers, co-workers, and any beauty enthusiast. Great makeup gift and beauty gift for bachelorettes, bridal showers, birthdays, holidays, and more.
body.description: Vanity Mirror with Bamboo Stand - 360°Swivel This multifunctional mirror offers a double-sided design that flips between 1x and 3x magnification, allowing you to view and make up with up-close accuracy. Perfect for placing on a vanity in your bedroom or bathroom, taking up small space.Natural, Modern Minimalist StyleLOTIKO bamboo bathroom mirror bring a natural, modern look to any bathroom space while being durable and mirror clearly. The inherent beauty of this natural material adds a clean contemporary touch to your home decor. Dimensions: 7 x 1.7 x 8 in Materials: white matte plastic frame and bamboo Stand Features: Double-sided 1x and 3x magnification, 360°swivel Durable Bamboo StandModern and sleek design. The heavy-duty structure makes it stand stably on different platforms，safe and secure. Smooth circular arc edge, matte plastic frame protection, lightweight and sturdy. AdjustableThis mirror is fully assembled but comes without a screwdriver. You can adjust the tightness of the screws by yourself if you find asymmetry on both sides of the mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is very nice looking, it is very clear and the magnification is great. It is a good size, not too small and not too big. The wood stand makes it sturdy, glad I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but does slide around too easily.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice but slides around and easy to tip I use the bubble wrap to cover so it will not glare all the time. Nicely made, need better way to sit and keep from sldiing around. Needs perhaps a different base with more support or ???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: I'm keeping the box to help protect while traveling. Purchased for camping and using inside of tent. Sturdy little mirror - sized right for the task.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and stable
reviews.reviewText: The mirror itself is unremarkable--it's a mirror; you can see yourself in it--but the base is surprisingly nice and sturdy for this price. Very stable. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's worth noting that the mirror is attached via screws to the wood stand. So if you keep adjusting the angle, eventually it gets too loose and won't stay in position. I fixedit with a screwdriver, but I is just something slightly annoying that I didn't realize when I bought it. Otherwise it's pretty and the mirror quality is what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest little mirror
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for applying makeup and lightweight. I love the double sided views. Not to mention it's cute so you can leave it out on the counter or desk and it not be an eyesore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Functional, easy to store and clean. Exactly as pictured and described.
